pygraphc.abstraction.ClusterAbstraction module¶

class ClusterAbstraction[source]¶

Bases: object

Get cluster abstraction based on longest common substring [jtjacques2010].

References

[jtjacques2010]jtjacques, Longest common substring from more than two strings - Python. http://stackoverflow.com/questions/2892931/longest-common-substring-from-more-than-two-strings-python.
static dp_lcs(graph, clusters)[source]¶

The processed string are preprocessed message from raw event log messages.

Parameters:
  • graph (graph) – A graph to be processed.
  • clusters (dict[list]) – Dictionary containing a list of node identifier per cluster.
Returns:

abstraction – Dictionary of abstraction string per cluster.
Return type:

dict[str]
static lcs(data)[source]¶

Get longest common substring from multiple string.

Parameters:data (list[str]) – List of string to be processed.
Returns:substr – A single string as longest common substring.
